name: NickToons Racing
overview: Characters from your favorite Nicktoons are motorin' for victory in this Game Boy Color racer! Get on the Rugrats track... watch out for those Angry Beavers ... steer clear of SpongeBob SquarePants. Race on multiple tracks based on your favorite Nicktoons - Tommy, SpongeBob SquarePants, Eliza, The Angry Beavers, CatDog and Arnold. Whether you play alone or against a friend, it looks like a wild ride ahead!
